Demonstrations Listed by Top-Level Domain

See the quick tour for a smaller set of demos that highlight the key features of Ptolemy II.

Ptolemy II Domains Demonstrations

Ptolemy II models that illustrate Model of Computation-oriented functionality.
  • Continuous (Continuous Time)
  • DDF (Dynamic Dataflow)
  • DE (Discrete Events)
  • HDF (Heterochronous Dataflow)
  • Metropolis II
  • Modal
  • PN (Process Networks)
  • Rendezvous (Processes with synchronous communication)
  • SDF (Synchronous Dataflow)
  • SR (Synchronous/Reactive)

Continuous

An recent implementation of Continuous Time semantics, for use with the modal domain.
  • Bouncing Ball (Does not require Java 3D)
  • Brownian
  • Noise
  • Noise Spectrum
  • Poisson, IncreasingRatePoisson
  • Sampled Clocks
  • Satellite
  • Sinusoid
  • Sinusoid In Noise)
  • Static Units
  • Square Wave Response
  • Switch
  • Thermostat
  • Transmission
  • Two Machine Infinite Bus Control (New in Ptolemy II 9.0)
  • Vehicle 2 Vehicle

Dynamic Dataflow (DDF)

  • Eratosthenes
  • Factorial
  • IfThenElse
  • IfThenElseFSM
  • Loop
  • OrderedMerge
  • RandomWalk
  • RijndaelEncryption

Discrete Events (DE)

  • Open Queueing Network
  • Inspection Paradox
  • Long Runs
  • Modal Model
  • Parallel Execution
  • Queue and Server (M/M/1 Queues)
  • Real Time Composite
  • Router
  • Smart Sender
  • SpontaneousSources
  • Timing Paradox
  • Trilateration (New in Ptolemy II 9.0)
  • Variable Delay

Heterochronous Dataflow (HDF)

  • AdaptiveCoding
  • Fibonacci
  • Hysteresis
  • Merge

MetroII

  • No MetroII demos yet

Modal

A newer implementation of Modal semantics, for use with the continuous domain.
  • ABP
  • Blending
  • Case
  • Chained Transitions
  • ModalBSC
  • MultipleRuns
  • StateTracker

Process Networks (PN)

  • Brock-Ackerman Anomaly
  • Counter Machine - Counter Machine With Exception - Counter Machine Prelim (New in Ptolemy II 9.0)
  • Nondeterministic Merge
  • Nondeterministic Merge with Feedback
  • Ordered Merge
  • Remove Nil Tokens
  • QR
  • Stack

Rendezvous

  • Barrier Synchronization
  • Resource Management
  • Sequencing
  • Write Regulator

Synchronous Dataflow (SDF)

  • Animate Vergil
  • Array
  • ApplyFFT
  • Butterfly (In the full version of Ptolemy: with codegen)
  • Case
  • ColtRandom
  • Communications demos: ConvolutionalCoder, Scrambler, TrellisDecoder, ViterbiDecoder
  • DFT Subset
  • Expression
  • Eye Diagram
  • Fixed-Point FIR Filter
  • Fixed-Point Arithmetic
  • Functional Mock-up Unit (FMU) Bouncing Ball (New in Ptolemy II 9.0)
  • Fourier Series
  • Input/Output actors: Append To File, Copy File, Copy Of Copy File, File Port Parameter, Read Expressions Command Line, Read Std In, Standard Input
  • Karplus-Strong Sound Synthesis
  • LMS Adaptive Filter
  • LogisticMap
  • Maximum Entropy Spectrum
  • Matlab in SDF (Requires that Matlab be installed locally)
  • ModelDisplay
  • Model Reference
  • Multiple Runs
  • Network Integration
  • NoisySinewave
  • Objects
  • Ptolemnizer (using Python)
  • Python Integration
  • Python Record Manipulation (New in Ptolemy II 9.0)
  • Rijndael Encryption
  • Sketched Signal
  • Slider Parameter and Port Parameters
  • Spectrum
  • Sound Spectrum
  • SynthesizedVoice
